channel.title: About the Loops category
channel.description:
Loops in Ren-C are a bit different from historical Redbol.
* They follow the [Loop Result Protocol](https://rebol.metaeducation.com/t/the-simple-yet-powerful-magic-of-the-loop-result-protocol/609)
* [BREAK and CONTINUE are definitional](https://rebol.metaeducation.com/t/definitional-break-and-continue-the-time-is-now/2066)
There seemed to be enough posts about loops to give them their own category. :man_shrugging:
